text: A vacation home or holiday home is a secondary dwelling that some people stay in in lieu of a hotel. Many upper middle class and upper class people own vacation homes and sometimes rent them out when not using them. There's a variety of vacation home options including *Timeshares in which people purchase a time slot, usually a week or two when they can occupy the unit. *Fractional ownership - This opinion allows people to own a portion of a far bigger property for vacation use such as a castle or historic mansion *hotel condominiums (also called condo-tels) - Hotels where people can purchase suites. And more. Vacation homes can come in the form of cottages, cabins, recreational vehicles, houseboats, tents,apartments\condominiums, beach houses, etc. Category:Houses
title: Holiday cottage
